title: #382: Where is Daniel Robinson?
description:
The truth of what really happened to Daniel Robinson is out there, but we need your help to find it. The twenty-four year old geologist was last seen on June 23, 2021, around 9am, driving away from his job site where he was taking water readings at a desert well outside of Buckeye, Arizona. Today, Daniel’s father, David Robinson joins us to tell us about his son, why he thinks there might have been foul play involved in his disappearance and what shocking things he found in the desert while searching for his son, with far too little help from law enforcement. David's strength is incredible and we want to help him find the truth. 

If you have any information that may help find Daniel, please reach out to 

https://pleasehelpfinddaniel.com

David is in desperate need for funds to do the forensic testing on Daniel's Jeep. Please donate if you can. https://pleasehelpfinddaniel.com

If you have a family member or friend who may have disappeared or who's remeains have been found in the Sonoran desert, you may hold the key to important information in this case, as well as others. Please reach out to the tipline below.

844-602-0660

#pleasehelpfinddaniel #danielrobinson #searchthedesert #testthejeep #amazingfather #SupportVictimsFamilies

Prose is the healthy hair regimen with your name all over it. Take your FREE in-depth hair consultation and get 15% off your first order today! Go to www.prose.com/realcrime

Start building better habits for healthier, long-term results. Sign up for your trial at www.noom.com/realcrime

TOPIC - We’ve talked about “Arctic Circle” and The “Missing Children” in the past, so you know we're excited about this streaming service and what they have to offer. Topic has critically acclaimed true crime docu-series as well as scripted shows inspired by real events. Topic is the only streaming service to entertain your dark side. Subscribe at www.topic.com and get a special 50% off your first 2 months with code REALCRIME.

Congratulations! You’ve found your next podcast!

Ride shotgun with me, Laura Richards world renowned and award-winning Criminal Behavioural Analyst, former New Scotland Yard every week as we profile behaviour and identify the red flags to prevent murders in slow motion.

Come join me in the intelligence cell as we deconstruct and analyse real cases.

www.crime-analyst.com

KILLER CASTING PODCAST - Love binging dark and twisty tv shows and movies? Love to obsess about the details? Wardrobe and wallpaper? Love to analyze the acting, directing and writing? Then you'll want to join Lisa and her wingman Dean breakdown all the best series and films to watch. Up next we deconstruct the "Ozark" finale, we ponder "The Offer" and more... www.killercastingpod.com 

BEST CASE WORST CASE

Be sure and check out Jim’s podcast Best Case/Worst Case that he does along with former Federal Prosecutor Francey Hakes. Join them as they go behind police lines with unparalleled access to law enforcement officers, looking back at their most memorable cases – for better or for worse. Subscribe now!
